level.heading: Residential disclosure requirements.
level.text: The residential real property disclosure statement approved by the Mayor shall contain the following:
A list of actually known defects or information concerning the following:
Structural systems, including roof, walls, floors, foundation, and basement;
Plumbing, electrical, heating, and air conditioning systems;
History of infestation by rodents or wood-boring insects, if any;
Alarm system and intercom system; and
Garage door opener and remote control; and
Any other information required by the Mayor to be published by rulemaking, provided that nothing in this chapter or in any rules shall be deemed to modify or amend § 42-1755(f).
